input.sentences: a neighborhood got closed down for our run today .
volunteers were standing at every mile to make sure the runners were okay .
a group of four people stuck together for the entire run .
a couple more streets were closed down to accommodate the race .
one volunteer stood at the finish line and waited for the day to be over .
output.sentences: The man driving the white car wished that he hadn't fought with his wife earlier.
The woman riding the bike felt healthy and confident.
The people running in the race were grateful that the cop was there to keep them safe.
The police followed behind the runners to make sure that they were safe.
The traffic guy prevented the runners from getting fun over by thoughtless drivers.
